channel.title: Does such a script exist? (general shopper)
channel.description:
im curious if theres any such script that exists. i dont auto anymore but im just wondering.
Many items are valuable on the street even tho they arent worth a lot in general shop. examples are uncut gems, coal, metal bars, treasure trail items, rares lol.
is there any script that sits in front of general stores all day and buys and such items? itd be interesting to run for a day and see what is obtained.

item.title: Does such a script exist? (general shopper)
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

I made one for gems and left it running for a week(it banked the gems), in world 1 varrock.

Got 5 diamonds, 19 rubys, 32 emeralds and 94 sapphires.

Account got banned soon after. The problem with buying is you need to bank and such. Ores aren’t worth it, treasure trail items cost like 70k(some)(same as rune) and such.

Read full topic
item.source: Does such a script exist? (general shopper)

item.title: Does such a script exist? (general shopper)
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

There are scripts(I don’t have it anymore) that buy things that want by name.
It clicks on every item.
Checks the name(You input the names EXACTLY into the script)
If it finds them.
Its buys them if it can.

Read full topic
item.source: Does such a script exist? (general shopper)
